description: The perfect day outside starts with the perfect tee. Slip into the Men's Wilderness Summit Short Sleeve Graphic Tee for moisture management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance. Plus, the durability of recycled polyester. Top it off with a custom mountainscape design and the Smartwool® "Go far. Feel good." slogan, and you're ready for whatever adventure today has in store.
name: Smartwool Wilderness Summit SS Graphic Tee - Mens
